completed.description: Drag refactoring complete - Eye dropper works well
Artboard size defaults to 8.5x11 instead of using actual settings - Fixed by initializing artboardWidthInches and artboardHeightInches from props and calling calculateArtboardSize() in onMount()
completed.resolution_details: Changed initialization to use props (artboardWidth/artboardHeight) instead of hardcoded 8.5x11 values, and ensured calculateArtboardSize() is called immediately in onMount()

requires_examination.description: Homepage (/) is only available to logged-in users, which is backwards. The root route should be accessible to everyone without redirecting to login/signup. This is a critical problem because it prevents anonymous users from viewing the homepage content.
Average point sampling does not work

Connection lines do not show a circle for the average sample area. For example, if you choose 11x11 sample size, it should show an 11x11 circle to indicate that. For 1x1 pixel, it should show a simple DOT, not an arrow.
